Title: Erratum to: Cancer in adolescents and young adults (Pediatric oncology, 10.1007/978-3-319-33679-4)
Abstract: © Springer International Publishing AG 2017.In the original version for chapter 13, the chapter author name was wrongly given as James Trocoli. The name of the author should be read: James V. Tricoli In the original version for chapter 34, the chapter title was wrongly given as DRAFT: AYA Advocacy in Action-Achievements, Lessons, and Challenges from a Global Movement for Change The correct chapter title should be: AYA Advocacy in Action-Achievements, Lessons, and Challenges from a Global Movement for Change The above mentioned corrections also updated in Table of Contents.
